content.query:
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS dbo.vw_history_historicalcustomuser
GO

CREATE VIEW dbo.vw_history_historicalcustomuser
AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
    --ext.[id],
    --ext.[created],
    --ext.[change_type],
    --ext.[instance_id],
    --ext.[channel],
    --ext.[change_details],
    --ext.[body],
    --ext.[email],
    --ext.external_id,
    --ext.*
   js.[id],
   js.[email],
   js.[client_id],
   js.[twitter],
   js.[facebook],
   js.[is_staff],
   js.[is_active],
   js.[is_tester],
   js.[date_joined],
   js.[external_id],
   js.[delete_token]
FROM [dbo].[ext_history_historicalcustomuser] ext
OUTER APPLY OPENJSON (JSON_QUERY(body, '$'))
   WITH (
        [id]            INT '$.id',
        [email]         VARCHAR(255) '$.email',
        [client_id]     VARCHAR(100) '$.client',
        [twitter]       VARCHAR(100) '$.twitter',
        [facebook]      VARCHAR(100) '$.facebook',
        [is_staff]      bit '$.is_staff',
        [is_active]     bit '$.is_active',
        [is_tester]     bit '$.is_tester',
        [date_joined]   VARCHAR(50) '$.date_joined',
        [external_id]   VARCHAR(255) '$.external_id',
        [delete_token]  VARCHAR(255) '$.delete_token'
   ) AS js
--WHERE ext.[created] >= dateadd(day,datediff(day,1,GETDATE()),0)
--   AND ext.[created] < dateadd(day,datediff(day,0,GETDATE()),0)
